title: Did Nancy Belusi, President of the United States House of Representatives, announce "a new plan to eliminate Donald Trump in 2020 "?
subtitle: The supposed "plans" involve reducing the minimum voting age in the Federation to 16 years.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Nancy Belusi has announced "tents" for "the drop of Donald Trump in 2020" by lowering the voting age.
